name: remcode-session-scripts
description: Streamlined JSON-based session tracking system - Legacy CSV components removed

scripts.test-migration: npm run install-deps && npm run migrate
scripts.setup-json: npm run install-deps && npm run migrate && npm run json:validate
scripts.status:
npm run json:analytics && echo '
✅ JSON Migration: COMPLETE' && echo '📊 Enhanced Analytics: OPERATIONAL' && echo '🔍 Schema Validation: ACTIVE'
scripts.phase2:
npm run advanced:analytics && npm run github:update && echo '
🎉 Phase 2: Enhanced Analytics & GitHub Integration COMPLETE'
scripts.comprehensive:
npm run advanced:analytics && echo '
📊 Comprehensive Analytics Generated!' && echo '📋 Check docs/analysis/ for detailed reports'
scripts.phase3:complete: echo '🎉 Phase 3: Migration Complete - All systems operational'
scripts.ecosystem:health: npm run json:validate && echo '✅ Ecosystem Health: GOOD'
scripts.migration:final: echo '📊 Migration Status: 100% COMPLETE - CSV to JSON migration successful'
scripts.dashboard:open: echo '🌐 Open docs/dashboard/index.html in your browser'
scripts.system:status: npm run status && echo '🎯 Phase 3 Integration: COMPLETE'

author: harshit-codes
